feature_model.name: Stack PL

meta.data: A feature model of a simple stack data structure
Markus Voelter, Using Domain-Specific Languages for Product Line Engineering, Tutorial at SPLC 2009, San Francisco, USA

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Stack :o Size :g [1,1] : Fixed :m Value : Dynamic :m Element Type :g [1,1] : Integer : Float : String :o Optimization :g [1,1] : Speed : Memory Usage :o Counter :o Additional Features :g [1,*] : Thread Safety : Bounds Check : Type Check
